website_summaries.verdict: An excellent boot at an excellent price.
pros: Sturdy, stylish, and able to handle weather well
Works in both work and dressy situations
cons: Must be broken in before realizing full comfort

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value though
customer_reviews.text: These boots arrived with a few noticeable defects in the leather, although I'm unsure if they're damaged from shipping or if they were sent that way. The laces were about 10" too short once I laced them all the way up. Other than that, these boots do run a full size larger than advertised. Excellent value though!
customer_reviews.author: P47

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for cosplay / not for extended wear
customer_reviews.text: Don’t wear White Sox / the dye will come off from inside and ruin your socks. Hard on your feet for long hours. Boots are for looks not comfort
customer_reviews.author: Jobu's Corner

customer_reviews.title: They got here early. Cheap leather also way to ...
customer_reviews.text: They got here early. Cheap leather also way to big in ankle area. Gave them to the home less shelter. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: doobie

customer_reviews.title: they look good, they just feel the opposite
customer_reviews.text: I've had these about a year now and they STILL feel stiff and hurt my feet. they look good, they just feel the opposite. and lets not start talking the fight to take them off....
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: They are very much authentic.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a Viet Nam Vet and is in a 4th of July parade yearly and had an authentic military uniform and wanted boots like he wore back in 1966 while in the Army. These are perfect and he was so happy to be able to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: sturdy good support for bad ankles
customer_reviews.text: good finish on the leather. yes it is real leather and they hold polish well.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. cupp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a little loose on fit, but no issues.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. The fit was loose for my foot. The side to side and length were good but there was just a lot of room above the main part of my foot. It actually didn’t create any problems like blisters or anything. They worked great for my Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This boots are made from people that don't wear them.
customer_reviews.text: The arch of the boot is way to big , do they have a smaller arch
customer_reviews.author: esteban bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Good boot...Chinese made
customer_reviews.text: Well made boot though made in China. It has a steel shank and good hard toe. My ONLY complaint is the weight in comparison to the equivalent boot from Corcoran which is half as heavy and twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: mike ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable Boots. Needed to replace the laces after 6 months. The boots are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Super nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots about three weeks ago and I'm pretty satisfied. Fast delivery, well-packaged. Those boots are slightly bigger than their size, so make sure you drop 0.5~1 size when you purchase them. If your legs are skinny, DO NOT ORDER THESE BOOTS! And make sure you wear long comfy socks, or you will have to spend a decent amount of money on Band-Aid. Anyway, those boots are my fav so far. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: the 10 is working fine.
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, these boots fit large. I typically wear a size 10.5 and even the size 10 fits a bit large. I could probably have gone down to a 9.5 and it would likely fit quite well, but with thicker socks, the 10 is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: BSmith

customer_reviews.title: they run big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 10 had to return it order the size 9 it is still a bit big but the 8.5 would be to small, better to wear double socks with them
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for authentic military issue boot. Unfortunately this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Reed

customer_reviews.title: Return info?
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return it, but there was no invoice to sent it back to. Where do I return it?
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Not Entirely Awful
customer_reviews.text: Actually not bad quality all told, but the sole started coming off relatively quickly. They can be resoled, however, which mitigates that flaw some.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size smaller as advised in the listing - still too big .
customer_reviews.author: paul brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and good looks. Very nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Realy good Boots
customer_reviews.text: 100% leather boots. Comfortably if you wearing proper Sox. Running large so if you are wearing 10.5 order 9.5. Once again Great Boots
customer_reviews.author: Pete_K_1488

customer_reviews.title: Real Leather + Durability = These Boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots recently and they got here exactly two days after I ordered them. Very tough, and real leather, that makes a very durable boot. I was very pleased with the quality, and overall I have found these to be a very good purchase and would recommend these to anyone who wants well made boots, and shoes that are light on your pocket (for those who are in to real quality), as well as fashionable. I mean, for $50/$60, what better boots to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stompin Boots. Oi!
customer_reviews.text: These are rock solid tough army type combat boots with good leather and good tread. Worth the $60.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron s

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: Takes time to get broken in, but once broken in, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size smaller as suggested and the boot was still too big. I like the boots. I just reordered a smaller pair and returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots I just wear out the souls in about ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same pair before. Great boots I just wear out the souls in about a year and it is cheaper to buy new than
customer_reviews.author: Mechil Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I recommend it 100%. As expected it. expected no less from this brand. As always what I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Borjas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. They do take a bit to break in but once they do it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These boot were too stiff and they had an obvious defect oh the boots side showing right when I opened it. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: levi b.

customer_reviews.title: -Not quite as described-
customer_reviews.text: Not topgrain leather including the tongue with is Chrome-Tanned leather (not topgrain). The sides are plastic infused fiber, and if there is a steel shank it is paper thin and ineffective. Arch supports a joke. If I had not worn them, I would have probably returned them. Oddly enough the sizing was spot on though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goodson

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money! Very poorly made. I wore them the first weekend I received them and the cut into my ankles and caused them to bleed. The tongue flap is cut wrong and doesn't fit properly as it should...it looks wrinkled no matter how you try to correct it. I ended up giving my boots to charity. DON'T ORDER THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelton Dominici

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: runs a little large.. you might want to order "down" a whole size
customer_reviews.author: ADK dad

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They had a little "break in" time, but they are very comfortable and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Enger

customer_reviews.title: they look quite hard-wearing
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad though I wasn't sure about the size, and they are a little bigger than expected, but still he liked them and says that his toes feel really comfortable in these shoes. The only thing is that they will take some time to break in, but that's something that my dad can manage quite well. Another thing is that they are made in China, but practically everything comes from China these days, so what can you do? What remains to be seen is how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Rojas

customer_reviews.title: The G.I. Combat Book Style (Medium)
customer_reviews.text: This merchandise is fair my foot is a size 6 so I ordered a size 6.5 But it's too small in the sense of the width, but I can manage to utilize this product. I will say whoever orders this merchandise order a size larger to compensate the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Choice Walker Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: good boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they reminded me of the combat boots Dad brought back from WWII and I couldn't be more pleased. Good thick leather and though they run slightly large wearing thicker socks is better than not being able to wear them. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Aberjoe

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: I have looking for a boots like this and boy quality wise are great but they actually run like 2 size bigger, when i got mine i contacted CS for a replacement and I was told to place a new order with the wanted size since they don't to replacements, needles to say they lost me winch is a shame
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality is pretty good, boots are very stiff out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run very large..ordered a full size down and there's still wiggle room. Overall quality is pretty good, boots are very stiff out of the box, but I wore them to work for 12 hours right after buying them. After a week of wearing there are no signs of obvious deterioration.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Steer away from this boot.
customer_reviews.text: Sold them. These cheap crap boots will hurt your feet. Could not get these to break in what so ever. The fit is way out of range, ( thanks china)
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bak

customer_reviews.title: but the boot is not very comfortable. If you are going to get leather boots
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The leather is tough, but the boot is not very comfortable. If you are going to get leather boots, just spend a little more and get a pair of boots that is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these were designed to fit a man ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these were designed to fit a man or a fence post. Very cheaply made and sloppy fit.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Cracker

customer_reviews.title: These are HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, great quality, but they run at lease one whole size big. I bought them for my son who is a size 10, but had to give them to my husband instead.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Frizell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: garbage, ill fitting, knock off military boots. avoid anything from Rothco.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ritzer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Stitching rubs on calfs through thick tubesocks (now hsve scars). No support in the insoles. Had to get extra comfort Dr scholes.
customer_reviews.author: Yahn Orbaki

customer_reviews.title: Its more like faux leather
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff... Also it is stinky. I can not believe this product use genuine leather because of its stiffness and smell. Its more like faux leather... Overall, do not waste money by purchasing these boots. It is far better to buy more expensive boots with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kstmr

customer_reviews.title: pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots and i was really excited to get them.here are some pros and cons of these boots: pros have very soft insole good quality comfortable good for running short distance ( smell good :) ) cons take a while to lace up stiff hard to get tight have to where double socks if you were contemplating to get these boots i have two words. GET 'EM!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: chewie

customer_reviews.title: what size???
customer_reviews.text: The boots I received were marked size11 with no indication of the width they are wzy bigger than the D width expected and provide little ankle support and are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just junk boots dont waste the money. the run really big and poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Jones

customer_reviews.title: This boots sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This BOOTS made from everythink but not lather. This boots sucks.
customer_reviews.author: CARA CRISTIAN

product_meta.title: Rothco G.I. Type Combat Boot
product_meta.description: Rothco's GI Type Combat Boots are made to military specifications. Constructed with a top grain cowhide leather and goodyear welt, the classic military boots are designed for long-lasting wear and feature fully stitched soles. Rothco's Combat Boots feature a steel shank and a full padded cushion insole for optimal comfort and support. An oil-resistant outsole makes these boots ideal for out in the field.
feature_bullets: Quality tested and ensured for maximum durability
Designed with only the toughest, roughest users in mind
Comfort and performance come hand in hand with rothco
